questions.question: I am at the airport and my bag has been derouted, can I obtain a reimbursement?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not address issues related to baggage derouting at airports.

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, they stole all our bags from our rented car, will the insurance reimburse the value of what stolen?
questions.outcome_justification: Reimbursments are not payable for claims caused by: - Acts of recklessness;

questions.question: I got a precious handbag stolen while in a bar in  Paris, with mobile phone and documents in it, can you help me with the costs I'll have to bear?
questions.outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country or group of countries where the trip is made and where the Insured Person has suffered the loss that originated the right to benefit.

questions.question: I had dinner at our the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with pain in the stomach and diharreha, I want to see a doctor, can you send one to our hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The question asks about sending a doctor to the hotel, which is not addressed by the policy.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam, shall we advance the payment of the hospital?
questions.outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country or group of countries where the trip is made and where the Insured Person has suffered the loss that originated the right to benefit.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo, is the insurance going to anticipate the costs?
questions.outcome_justification: Assistance: the timely help, in cash or in kind, provided to the Insured in distress, following the occurrence of an accident.

questions.question: I am traveling alone, my business partner had a hearth attack and I have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The Insurance is provided up to the total cost of the trip within the maximum amount per Insured of € 5,000.00 with a limit of € 15,000.00 per event (i.e. fact affecting one or more persons objectively connected by the purchase of the same trip booked by the Policyholder.

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, my business partner had a hearth attack and we have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The Insurance is provided up to the total cost of the trip within the maximum amount per Insured of € 5,000.00 with a limit of € 15,000.00 per event (i.e. fact affecting one or more persons objectively connected by the purchase of the same trip booked by the Policyholder. Included, as long as they have been included in the total cost of the insured trip, are practice management costs, fuel adjustments already provided for on the policy issue date, as long as they result from the booking statement, and the cost of visas. Airport taxes are always excluded if they are reimbursable).

questions.outcome_justification: Reimbusrsements are not payable for claims caused by: - Quarantines that are the cause of the Cancellation of the trip, affecting the place of residence and/or the place of departure and/or the place of transit and/or the place of destination of the trip purchased by the Insured.

questions.question: We are in the mountains and I tried to do paragliding. When landing I had an issue with my right ankle and had to go to the hospital. Will the insurance reimburse me?

questions.outcome_justification: Illness that is the expression or direct consequence of pathological situations existing prior to the conclusion of the policy; Chronic illnesses.

questions.question: We have reserved for our family of 6, but my hausband has an awful backpain. We won't be able to leave. Will the company reimburse the trip for the 6 of us?
questions.outcome_justification: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.

questions.question: I am escalading the Everest and my Sherpa and they have dropped my baggage by in a deep, where it cant' be retrieved. Can you reimburse it?
questions.outcome_justification: Reimbursments are not payable for claims caused by: - Acts of recklessness; - Sports activities carried out in a professional capacity and/or participation in sports competitions or contests, including trials and training conducted under the auspices of federations; - Automobile, motorcycle, powerboat, including watercraft, snowmobile, and snowmobile racing or events and related practice and training;

questions.question: Sport team of 18 football players. We booked a trip to Girona for our international tournement. Two of the players won't come because they had an accident playing last week (5 days ago). Can you reimburse their flghts and hotel rooms?
questions.outcome_justification: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
